biography: Lassi is a highly accomplished golfer who hails from Lakeside Golf Vammala.  A regular participant in the prestigious Hector Trophée, Lassi has consistently showcased his exceptional talent and skill on the course.

His dedication to the game is evident in his remarkable record, having competed in the Hector Trophée every year since 2022. While he has yet to claim the coveted Hector Trophée title itself, he achieved a significant personal victory in 2022, securing the Victor trophy as the tournament's top individual performer.

Lassi’s consistent presence in the Hector Trophée speaks to his commitment to excellence. With each passing year, his game has grown, making him a formidable competitor and a player to watch in the years to come.
